thread.title: Meet the guy who has been taking selfies for eight years
thread.title_full: Meet the guy who has been taking selfies for eight years

title: Meet the guy who has been taking selfies for eight years
text: Meet the guy who has been taking selfies for eight years Thursday, 1 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) *Melbourne, Oct. 1 (ANI): If you think that you click the highest number of selfies, then you also need to know that there is someone who has been taking selfies every day for the past eight years.* Melbourne, Oct. 1 (ANI): If you think that you click the highest number of selfies, then you also need to know that there is someone who has been taking selfies every day for the past eight years. Hugo Cornellier, a YouTube user, has been documenting his ageing since the age of 12 by taking selfies every day, and his two-minute time-lapse video is a compilation of nearly 3000 self-portraits, reports News.com.au. Talking about his clicks, the 20-year-old Montreal resident said he will keep on taking pictures as long as he is physically able as he carries his laptop where ever he goes. Cornellier further said it all started when his father bought him a time-lapse camera and he decided to document his teen years and ageing process. (ANI) This Guy Has Been Taking a Selfie Every Day for the Last Eight Years 02:12 Hugo Cornellier claims he has been taking selfies since well before they became popular. In fact, this video is his proof. For the last eight years, Hugo has been taking a selfie every single day. This video shows how he has changed from day to day from the ages of 12 to 20. Credit: YouTube/Hugo...
